altTitles.ja: スパイ ファミリー

description.ar: أمضى الجاسوس الخبير المسمى <الشفق> أيامه في مهام سرية ، وكل ذلك من أجل تحقيق عالم أفضل. لكن في يوم من الأيام ، حصل على أمر جديد صعب للغاية من القيادة. من أجل مهمته ، يجب عليه تكوين أسرة مؤقتة وبدء حياة جديدة؟!
description.en:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!
description.es: El hábil espía Tasogare se dedicaba diariamente a cumplir misiones especiales por un mundo mejor. Un día recibe un complicado desafío... Su deber es crear una familia falsa y comenzar una nueva vida para poder cumplir la misión, ¿¡pero...!? ¡¡Un Espía × Acción × Comedia de una familia peculiarl!!
description.id: “Twilight,” seorang mata-mata yang hebat, setiap hari menjalankan misi rahasia untuk menciptakan dunia yang lebih baik. Suatu hari, dia mendapatkan perintah baru yang sangat sulit. Demi misi itu, dia harus memiliki keluarga sementara dan memulai hidup baru sebagai seorang ayah! Mata-mata x Aksi x Komedi keluarga istimewa!
description.it: Twilight, una delle migliori spie al mondo, ha trascorso la vita ad affrontare missioni sotto copertura per rendere il mondo un posto migliore. Un giorno però riceve un compito particolarmente difficile: dovrà formare una famiglia temporanea e iniziare una nuova vita!
description.kk: Мастер тыңшының кодтық аты<Twilight> өмірін жақсырақ әлем туралы арман үшін жасырын миссияларда өткізді. Бірақ бір күні ол командадан ерекше қиын жаңа бұйрық алады. Миссиясы үшін ол уақытша отбасын құрып, жаңа өмір бастауы керек пе?! Бірегей отбасы туралы тыңшылық/экшн/комедия!
description.pl:
Wyśmienity szpieg, Zmierzch, poświęcił się wykonywaniu tajnych misji z powodu marzeń o lepszym świecie. Ale pewnego dnia otrzymuje bardzo trudne do wykonania zadanie. Aby osiągnąć cel misji, musi założyć tymczasową rodzinę i prowadzić życie najzwyczajniejszego w świecie ojca!  
Oto opowieść o jedynej w swoim rodzaju rodzinie!
description.ru:
Мастерский шпион с кодовым именем <Сумрак> проводит свои дни в закулисных миссиях, всё ради мечты о лучшем мире. Но однажды он получает особенно сложное новое указание от командования. Для этой миссии он обязательно должен завести фиктивную семью и начать новую жизнь! Шпионская экшен-комедия об единственной в своём роде семье!

---
Хитроумный шпион по прозвищу «Сумрак» изо дня в день выполнял секретные миссии, чтобы сделать мир лучше. Однажды он получил очередное трудное задание — ради миссии ему предстоит… обзавестись временной семьёй и начать новую жизнь?! Вас ждёт яркая смесь из шпионского боевика и необычной семейной комедии!
description.th: สุดยอดสปาย "สนธยา" ได้ปฏิบัติการสอดแนมทุกๆวันเพื่อโลกที่ดีกว่า แต่แล้ววันนึงเขาก็ได้รับภารกิจสุดหิน... เพื่อการนั้นเขาจึงได้สร้างครอบครัวปลอมๆและเริ่มชีวิตใหม่!? สปาย x แอคชั่น x คอเมดี้ครอบครัวสุดแนว!
description.uk:
Холоднокровний і геніальний шпигун з кодовим ім'ям «Сутінь» завжди виконував свою роботу чітко і без зайвого шуму. Свою професію він обрав, плекаючи мрії про кращий світ. Він звик до надзвичайно складних завдань, важливість яких мала найвищий рівень, виконуючи які, він наражав своє життя на небезпеку. Але цього разу… Йому була надіслана інформація про нову місію, для успішного виконання якої «Сутінь» повинен завести сім'ю та вдавати відповідального та люблячого батька на ім'я Лоід Фолджер. Так він «удочирив» дівчинку на ім'я Аня. Дівчинка відразу входить у роль «дочки» і радіє кожній миті, яку проводить з новим «батьком». Тепер є тато та донька, але, як же мама? Нею стане неповторна наймана вбивця на ім'я Юрі Бріар (позивний - "Принцеса шипів"). 
Манґа розкриє всі тонкощі та незвичайний життєвий шлях нової «сім'ї», в якій кожен легко може виконати найскладніше завдання, або усунути ціль, але чи зможуть вони виконувати ролі «мами», «тата» та «доньки»?
description.pt-br:
O brilhante espião "Twilight" se dedicava diariamente a cumprir missões secretas por um mundo melhor. Porém, um dia, ele recebeu uma nova tarefa bastante complicada... Para cumprir a sua missão, ele deve formar uma família temporária e começar uma nova vida, mas...?! Uma história de Espiões × Ação × Comédia de uma família bem peculiar!

[ 1° TEMP.(parte 1 e 2) DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 38. ]
description.zh-hk: 技藝高超的間諜<黃昏>，為了更加美好的世界,每天從事著諜報任務。有一天，司令下達了新的難題——…。為了完成任務，所臨時組建的家庭，所展開的新生活，但是！？間諜×打鬥×與眾不同的家族喜劇現在開始！！

description.en:
A lonely girl finds solace in her bag full of memories; now it's time for her to break through her shell.

‘Berserker Bartz’, a legendary solo player of Arpedia Online, had his character hacked and deleted one day.

"Damn it. No way I'm giving up! I don't know who you are, but I'm going to find you and crush you!"

Having lost the character he put his all into, Kang YuHan creates 'Zigg', a blacksmith with the sole mission of finding the hacker!

Can YuHan find the hacker who deleted Bartz?
Follow Zigg's action-packed adventure to become the greatest blacksmith!

On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、

En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

altTitles.ja: ドールズフロントライン

description.en:
Based on the popular mobile strategy game from MICA Team.  
  
In the year 2030, "The Belian Island Incident" happened where a highly radioactive alien substance was accidentally exposed to the atmosphere, causing half the world's population to be killed or mutated into zombie-like creatures called ELID (Euroky Low-Emission Infectious Disease) and the land becoming contaminated and uninhabitable. 

In response to the world suffering a shortage of Manpower, highly advanced androids with superior strength and advanced AI capable of expressing emotions called A-Dolls (Autonomous Dolls) were created.  

When World War 3 broke out in 2045 to 2051 over uncontaminated land and resources, Private Military Companies used A-Dolls with the ability to fight called T-Dolls (Tactical Dolls) in the war, which made them rich, becoming the de facto police and military of many nations after the war ended. 

However, in 2061, T-Dolls of the world's largest PMC, Sangvis Ferri, suddenly rebelled, killed their human masters and attack nearby human settlements. In response, Grifon & Kryuger PMC and their T-Dolls were hired to stop and contain the Sangvis Ferri Forces.

description.en: In the Edo period, there was a shrine maiden called "Itsukihime" in the mountain village of Kadono. Jinta, a young man who acts as the shrine maiden's guardian despite being a stranger, encounters a mysterious demon who speaks of the far future in the forest where he went to defeat it. From Edo to the Heisei era, this huge Japanese fantasy series follows a demon man who travels through time while continuously questioning the meaning of wielding a sword.
description.ja: 江戸時代、山間の集落葛野には「いつきひめ」と呼ばれる巫女がいた。よそ者ながら巫女の護衛役を務める青年・甚太は、討伐に赴いた森で、遥か未来を語る不思議な鬼に出会う――江戸から平成へ。刀を振るう意味を問い続けながら途方もない時間を旅する鬼人の歩みは、重くて切ない。
description.pt-br: No período Edo, havia uma sacerdotisa chamada "Itsukihime" na aldeia montanhosa de Kadono. Jinta, um jovem que atua como guardião da sacerdotisa, apesar de ser um estranho, encontra um misterioso demônio que fala sobre o distante futuro na floresta onde foi para derrotá-lo. Do Edo à era Heisei, esta imensa série de fantasia japonesa acompanha um homem demônio que viaja no tempo enquanto questiona continuamente o significado de empunhar uma espada.

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

description.ar: قرر الدوق فيريو فولوتي فجأة تبني ابنة ووجد فتاة أيضًا لمن يحبها. تدور هذه القصة حول عائلة “محبة” من أب الأغنى والأقوى والأكثر تغطرسًا في العالم، وابنته بالتبني اللطيفة الصريحة والمحبة للعضلات، وزوجة أب مع سر غريب.
description.en:
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.
description.id: Duke Voreoti yang tampan adalah pria paling menakutkan di kekaisaran. Tapi suatu hari, dia ingin mengadopsi seorang anak?!
description.ko:
“아이를 입양한다”

어느 날 갑자기 떨어진 북부의 주인 보레오티의 폭탄 발언.
그리고 기적처럼 만난 “검은색”을 지닌 아이.

그런데…

“근☆육이 제일 좋아~ ☆불끈불끈☆ 모여라~ ٩(๑˃́ꇴ˂̀๑)۶”
“이두근 (ง˙∇˙)ว, 삼두근 (ง˙∇˙) ง”
“흉근 복근 짜릿해 ദ്ദി ˉ͈̀꒳ˉ͈́ )✧.”

“…주군, 저희 애들은 저 정도까지는 아니었습니다만.”

아니다. 우리 애가 얼마나 똑똑한데. 일곱 살인데 어려운 말도 많이 알고, 책도 빨리 읽고, 배짱도 있고… 너네 우리 딸이 구운 쿠키 먹어봤나? 아무튼 재능이 넘쳐난단 말이다. 우리 딸은 천재야. 얼굴도 날 닮아서 요즘 부쩍 미모가 꽃을 피우고 있지. 벌써부터 두려울 정도다. 이 내가 말이지.

……그래, 인정한다. 내 딸은 변태다.

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

description.en: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
description.es:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Kouji Mikagami, memiliki nilai pelajaran biasa dan kemampuan atletik biasa, tapi "dia tidak banyak kalah" dalam bermain game, entah kenapa saat bermain game dia tiba-tiba dipanggil ke dunia lain. Sebuah cerita yang dimulai dengan apa yang terjadi. Meskipun mengkonsumsi 1.000 batu ajaib tingkat tinggi untuk melakukan pemanggilan, fakta bahwa ia hanya memiliki "Skill Copy" kemampuan terlemah membuat marah pendeta, dan akhirnya Mikagami dijadikan budak gladiator di Colosseum. Mikagami yang kesal dengan situasi yang tiba-tiba menyadari bahwa situasinya seperti dalam game, dan dengan kemampuan terlemahnya dia akan membuat budak harem di dunia lain.
description.es-la:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.

altTitles.ja: Amano Megumi ha Sukidarake!

altTitles.en: Amano Megumi is Full of Gaps!
Amano Megumi is FULL of Openings!

altTitles.th: เรื่องหนักอกของอามาโนะ เมกุมิ!

altTitles.ja: 天野めぐみはスキだらけ!

description.en: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
description.ja: 剣道に打ち込む体育会系ぷに子・めぐみと、東大志望のひょろ長男子・学──幼なじみの二人は中学で疎遠になるも、同じ高校に進学して再び距離を縮めはじめた。プラスとマイナス、N極とS極──真逆な二人は引かれ合う…？
description.pt-br: Shindo Manabu é um estudante de uma escola de ensino médio muito prestigiada cujo objetivo é entrar na Universidade de Tóquio. Ele estuda constantemente e tenta nunca perder de vista este objetivo. Isso até que sua amiga de infância, Amano Megumi, que frequenta a mesma escola, começa a distraí-lo. Ele originalmente só se lembrava dela como a moleca que ela era quando criança, até perceber o quão “desenvolvida” ela se tornou. À medida que esses dois se aproximam, a hilaridade geralmente acontece e, posteriormente, Manabu se torna cada vez mais distraído de seu objetivo de entrar na Universidade de Tóquio.

description.en: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

altTitles.ja: 星のファンタジー 水野英子 珠玉短編集

altTitles.en: Starry Fantasy - Hideko Mizuno Short Story Gems

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Fantasy - Mizuno Hideko Shugyoku Tanpenshuu

description.en:
A collection of Mizuno one-shots, including some of her earliest works:
- **Night of the Blue Star** (青い星の夜, Aoi Hoshi no Yoru) - Toshiko, a girl in poverty, has always longed for the pair of red shoes at her local store. On the day of her town's star festival, Toshiko encounters a puppy being harassed by some children. This puppy takes an unusual liking to her...
- **Carnival!** (カーニバル！)
- **Granite**  (みかげ石, Mikageishi)
- **The King Who Ate Blue Roses** (青いバラをたべた王様, Aoi Bara wo Tabeta Ousama)
- **The Swan of Tuonela** (トゥオネラの白鳥, Tuonela no Hakucho) - Adaptation of Sibelius's tone poem.
- **Tale of One Snowy Night** (ある雪の夜の物語, Aru Yuki no Yoru no Monogatari)
- **The Mermaid Lights the Fire** (人魚が火をともす, Ningyo ga Hi wo Tomosu)
- **Star Child** (星の子, Hoshi no Ko) - The 'title' one-shot of this compilation. Goro is an astronomer down on his luck, struggling to discover something. One night, an little angelic being named Chiru comes down from the stars, changing Goro's life...
- **Glass Angel** (ガラスの天使, Garasu no Tenshi)
- **Two Suns** (二つの太陽, Futatsu no Taiyou)

(Note: Official raw only for Star Child).

altTitles.en: I'll be Taking Over this Duchy
I'll Take the Dukedom From Today

altTitles.es-la: Tomaré el Ducado a Partir de Hoy

description.en:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long… Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger…

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"
description.pt-br:
"Eu era uma nobre esse tempo todo?!"

Hilde, uma plebeia que trabalha em um restaurante na vila, é repentinamente notificada por um homem bonito chamado Logan de que ela é membro da família de um dos quatro ducados do império e ouve que sua mãe 'Lucia Arpeggio' era uma poderosa maga no passado.

O Duque Arpeggio ofereceu torná-la um membro oficial da família se ela puder provar que tem fortes poderes mágicos, e Hilde aceita para escapar de seu sustento oprimido e desfrutar de uma vida confortável.

No entanto, sua empolgação não dura muito... Cultura, magia, história, literatura, etc. O número de coisas que os nobres precisavam aprender era infinito! Além disso, esqueça a recepção de Hilde, seus familiares apenas lhe lançaram olhares frios e até colocaram sua vida em perigo…

"Vocês não me deram escolha. Eu, uma ex-plebeia, assumirei este ducado!"

altTitles.ja: サクランボッチ

description.en: Sakura, a girl who has difficulty making friends. Kayo, a girl belonging to a literature club of which she is the only member. Yuri, a girl who seems to have a kind of one-sided rivalry with Sakura. Koyuki, a girl with a rather quiet character. These girls with totally different personalities unexpectedly cross paths when all four join their school's literature club!
description.ja: 物事を深く考えすぎるがゆえに友達を作れない桜。そんな桜がある日出会ったのは、部員一人の文芸部部長・花陽。桜を一方的にライバル視するお嬢様・百合や心の声では多弁、現実は無口な後輩・小雪と、個性豊かな残念美少女たちが文芸部に大集結!?

title.en: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin o Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の教育係 ～勇者学院を追放された平民教師は魔王の娘たちの家庭教師となる～

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Heroes' Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for Demons' Daughters
The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Brave Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for the Devil's Daughters

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

description.en:
Lee Joon was an ordinary high school student.

During the entrance ceremony, he was caught up in a strange phenomenon and died.

[You have died.] [Restarting from checkpoint.] [Loading…]

But then, a message appeared before his eyes.

『Congratulations on your acceptance at Nakseong Highschool, the school of secrets and mysteries. Uncover the shady secrets hidden within the school, or fight against the legends and ghost stories of the campus in order to earn points to unlock special abilities. Additionally, you must gather comrades to prevent the resurrection of the Demon King before graduation. The world is in your hands.』

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

title.en: Seijo wa Tokku ni Shoukansareteiru. Nihon ni.

altTitles.ja: 聖女はとっくに召喚されている。日本に。

altTitles.en: Here She is, the Saint in Japan.
The Saintess Was Summoned a Long Time Ago. To Japan.

altTitles.vi: Thánh nữ vô tình bị triệu hồi tới Nhật Bản

description.en:
She was supposed to have been summoned as a saintess, but instead got thrown into a country called Japan. Alexandra Ollier, a.k.a. "Rei Natsukawa", hides her magical powers and works as an office worker for a small company in modern Japan. 

"As long as I can live peacefully and uneventfully, this is fine." says Rei, who faces many small troubles standing in the way of her lifestyle.
Follow Rei Natsukawa, a mage possessing high level magical powers, and her seemingly ordinary yet not-so-ordinary story...

(Source: Young Champion)
description.ja: 聖女として召喚されたはずなのに、放り込まれたのは日本という国だった。夏川レイことアレクサンドラ・オリエールは、現代日本で魔法の力を隠して事務員として小さな会社で働いている。「平穏無事に生きられればそれでいい」そんな夏川レイの生活に立つ小さな波風の数々。高魔力持ちの魔法使い、夏川レイの平凡そうで平凡ではない物語。
description.vi:
Đáng lẽ cô ấy được triệu hồi như một nữ thánh, nhưng thay vào đó lại bị ném vào một đất nước tên là Nhật Bản. Alexandra Ollier, hay hiện tại là "Rei Natsukawa", phải che giấu sức mạnh ma thuật của mình và làm nhân viên văn phòng cho một công ty nhỏ ở Nhật Bản hiện đại.

"Chỉ cần tôi có thể sống yên bình và bình yên là được." Rei, người phải đối mặt với nhiều rắc rối nhỏ cản trở lối sống của cô, nói.
Hãy theo chân Rei Tsukawa, một pháp sư sở hữu sức mạnh ma thuật cấp cao và câu chuyện tưởng chừng như bình thường nhưng lại không hề tầm thường của cô..

altTitles.ja: 捕食者系魔法少女

description.en:
Humanity finds itself on the brink of extinction due to the emergence of the Incubi, otherworldly monsters that capture humans to use as breeding material, and the only ones that can stand against these enemies are the Witches, magical girls given powers by supernatural beings. High schooler Renka Azuma is one such girl; her alter ego is Silver Lotus, a magical girl controlling countless insects to fight the Incubi day after day.

On a certain day, Silver Lotus rescues a fellow Witch, a novice named Azure Nova, from an Incubi attack. This meeting with this self-proclaimed fan of hers is an encounter that introduces a change to Silver Lotus’s otherwise solitary daily life?! Here begins a dark fantasy about an unorthodox magical girl who commands insects to devour monsters!
description.id:
Kemunculan monster dunia lain bernama Incubus, yang berkembang biak dengan menjadikan manusia sebagai inang, telah mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan. Satu-satunya yang bisa melawan mereka adalah para gadis penyihir (Witch) yang diberi kekuatan oleh entitas supernatural. Seorang siswi SMA bernama Azuma Renka juga berubah menjadi Silver Lotus, gadis penyihir yang dapat mengendalikan banyak serangga, dan bertarung setiap hari melawan para monster. Suatu hari, Silver Lotus menyelamatkan seorang gadis penyihir pemula bernama Azure Nova yang diserang oleh Incubus. Pertemuannya dengan gadis yang mengaku sebagai penggemarnya ini perlahan-lahan mulai mengubah kehidupan Silver Lotus yang selama ini penuh kesepian—!?

Sebuah fantasi gelap tentang gadis penyihir yang mengendalikan serangga dan memangsa monster, dimulai!

altTitles.ja: グリーンワールズ

description.en:
Plants have taken over the planet.  
  
In 2017, the vegetation in Tokyo rose up and toppled human society in moments.  
The few survivors are forced to live in the relative safety of a subway network, but supplies are running low.  
Join an average high school student named Akira as he challenges the plants in a struggle for survival!

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.pl: Kaoru i Rin. Rozkwitając z tobą

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンリセット

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

description.en: Ao-ko Nagisa is a brand new teacher. She's posted to a tiny island on the edge of Japanese territory called Kotoko Island, 30 HOURS by boat from Tokyo. The island is so small there are only five students at the school. Everday becomes an adventure as Ao-ko gets to know her students, the other islanders and the island itself (including dolphins and other assorted wildlife.)

description.en: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?!
description.ja: 平凡な人生を送る事を恐れていた仁科真知は、父の勧めで東京に出る事をこれ幸いとばかりに承諾する。東京の高校へと進学し、真知は一人暮らしを開始！だが、自称忍者の同級生・香住朧と出会い、彼女の人生は変化して!?
description.pt-br: De Miyagi à vida agitada de uma escola secundária de Tóquio, Machi Nishina queria tudo menos o comum. Seu desejo é atendido da forma mais inesperada quando ela encontra Oboro Kasumi, um colega de classe que guarda um segredo, que acaba seguindo sua casa...?! Uma nova era de amizade e comédia juvenil se desenrola!

description.en:
In Shimoyama Middle School, the Experiment Club and Karate Club each only have one member left, and as a result, must share one classroom. These two students, Sharaku Homura and Yamazaki Yousuke (a.k.a Karate Kid) together solve numerous impossible mysteries that they happen to run into!
Originally a doujinshi by Nemoto Shou, now an award-winning manga, having won the Hokkaido Mystery Cross Match Award!

description.en: The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.

description.en:
In order to clear the name of ‘Emi’, a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess's revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!
description.vi: Để minh oan cho ‘Emi’, một cô gái đã tái sinh thành Remilia, nhân vật phản diện của trò chơi otome, Remilia, người đã luôn theo dõi cô, bắt đầu trả thù!

description.en:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.es-la: ¡Una serie sobre un juego de fantasía hiperrealista! "Sargent Ha, loco bastardo. ¿Disparó otra ronda completa de tiros al blanco?" El francotirador Ha Lee Ha simplemente quería ser parte del ejército para siempre. Sin embargo, debido a un desafortunado accidente, quedó parapléjico y fue devuelto a la sociedad. El revolucionario juego de realidad virtual [Middle Earth] le presentó una nueva vida. ¡El dinero obtenido en [la Tierra Media] tiene valor en el mundo real! Sin embargo, ¡arruinó su oportunidad al seleccionar el personaje de nivel más bajo! "No soy como los demás. Esto es todo lo que tengo". Pólvora negra, bolas de hierro y baquetas ... ¡Les mostraré lo que es un verdadero 'mosquetero'!
description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

altTitles.ja: 列強戦線

description.en: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!
description.ja: 2206年ーー環境汚染や資源枯渇などにより、人の地球居住可能年数は残り100年と迫っていた。そんな中、人類存続を目的とし、世界人口を減らすため、滅亡させる国を選ぶ戦争『亡国決定戦』の開催が決まる！！ 各国の代表として戦うのは、人ならざる異能を持ち、最強と謳われし少年少女たち。

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.en: Return of the Mount Hua Sect

altTitles.th: หวนคืนสู่ฮวาซาน

altTitles.en: Return of the Flowery Mountain Sect

altTitles.pt-br: Retorno da seita do monte hua

altTitles.es-la: El regreso de la secta del monte hua

description.en:
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. 

After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. 

He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. ……What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?

---

**Links:**
- [Animated PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHTcZsg975A)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/jianzunguilai/list?title_no=2695)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/ANCIENTCHINESE/jianzunguilai/list?title_no=1639)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/sword-master/list?title_no=2899)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/return-of-the-blossoming-blade/list?title_no=3029)
description.id: Murid ke-13 dari sekte Hwasan, Cheong Myeong, si pendekar pedang sakti bunga plum akhirnya berhasil membunuh kepala dari sekte iblis, Cheonma. Namun pertarungan tersebut telah merenggut nyawa Cheong Myeong sendiri beserta seluruh sekte Hwasan yang menjadi tempat perguruannya. Siapa yang menyangka, setelah kematiannya ternyata Cheong Myeong terlahir kembali 100 tahun kemudian! Tapi di masa ini tidak ada seorang pun yang mengingat Sekte Hwasan?! "...Apa? Sekte Hwasan hancur?!"
description.it:
Chung Myung, il 13esimo discepolo della Mount Hua Sec, uno dei 3 grandi spadaccini, Il santo della spada del fiore del pruno sconfisse Chun Ma, colui che ha portato distruzione e caos nel mondo.
Dopo la battaglia, esala il suo ultimo respiro in cima alla montagna del quartiere generale della Heavenly Demon Sect.

Ma, dopo 100 anni rinasce nel corpo di un bambino.
....Cosa? La mont Hua Sec è scomparsa? Cosa sta succedendo?
description.ko:
대 화산파 13대 제자.천하삼대검수 매화검존 청명.
천하를 혼란에 빠뜨린 고금제일마 천마의 목을 치고 십만대산의 정상에서 영면.
백 년의 시간을 뛰어넘어 아이의 몸으로 다시 살아나다.
......뭐? 화산이 망해? 이게 뭔 개소리야!?
description.ru:
13-й ученик великой школы Хуашань, один из трех величайших фехтовальщиков в мире - благородный клинок цветущей сливы Чхон Мён.
Последним ударом клинка он убивает Чхонма, повергшего весь мир в хаос, и погибает на вершине горы из голов тысячи демонов.
А спустя 100 лет он перерождается в теле ребенка, чтобы возродить из пепла некогда одну из самых великих, но ныне всеми забытую школу Мурима - Хуашань.
Цветки сливы рано или поздно опадают. Однако когда приходит холодная зима, а за ней - весна, слива распускается в своем полном великолепии.
description.th: สงครามกับเทพมารสิ้นสุดแล้ว และความตายที่ไม่อาจเลี่ยงได้กำลังคืบคลานมาหาข้าเช่นกัน ข้าผู้เป็นศิษย์รุ่น 13 แห่งฮวาซานได้ปลิดชีพเทพมารที่สั่นคลอนทั่วพิภพลงได้ในที่สุด และสิ้นสุดอายุขัยบนจุดสูงสุดของยอดเขา ...แต่พอข้าลืมตาขึ้นอีกที กลับกลายเป็นยาจกไร้กำลัง นี่ข้ากลับมาเกิดใหม่เป็นขอทานหรือนี่?!
description.zh:
剑尊大战魔尊后同归于尽！
百年后竟重生成柔弱孩童？
男主清明前世是闻名江湖的华山派梅花剑尊，耗尽全力消灭了武林魔头“天魔”，最终与其同归于尽。但他却在百年后重生成了一个落魄小乞丐，并且保留着前世所有记忆。而在现世，曾是江湖名派的“华山派”已经没落至无人知晓的地步，清明得知这一事实后不能接受。当他找到华山后，发现门派已油尽灯枯。但清明仍然还记得百年前门派的道义和武学精神，他很不甘心，于是以孩童之身重新拜入华山派门下。但入门后他才知道，原来门派没落竟与前世自己和天魔大战有关！孩童之身的他该如何重振门派雄风呢？
description.zh-hk: 華山派梅花劍尊青明與天魔同歸於盡後，再次醒來發現百年後的華山派竟已不屬於九派一幫，震驚之下他立志要讓華山派重振當年盛極一時的威風!

title.en: Using My Cooking Skills in a Murim World

altTitles.en: A Bowl of Black Bean Noodles Would Be Served by the Son-in-Law of Zhuge Family

altTitles.pt-br: Usando minhas Habilidades Culinárias no Murim

description.en:
With a dream to become the ultimate Chinese cuisine chef, our protagonist finds himself inexplicably transported to the Song Dynasty in China! However, upon awakening, he discovers that he possesses no martial arts skills whatsoever. All that remains are the culinary techniques he mastered in his previous life. Surprisingly, these dishes… receive an overwhelmingly positive response!

Can he, with a single bowl of Jjajangmyeon, truly conquer the martial world?
Will he be able to captivate the Central Plains with his Jjajangmyeon and lead a successful second life in this era?
description.pt-br:
Com o sonho de se tornar o melhor chef da culinária chinesa, nosso protagonista se vê inexplicavelmente transportado para a Dinastia Song na China! No entanto, ao acordar, ele descobre que não possui nenhuma habilidade em artes marciais. Tudo o que resta são as técnicas culinárias que ele dominou em sua vida anterior. Surpreendentemente, esses pratos… recebem uma resposta extremamente positiva!

Ele pode, com uma única tigela de Jjajangmyeon, realmente conquistar o mundo marcial? Ele será capaz de cativar as Planícies Centrais com seu Jjajangmyeon e levar uma segunda vida bem-sucedida nesta era?

altTitles.ja: ？？？ランクの裏装備無双

description.en:
A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.

A new slapstick comedy series by Arawi Keiichi, author of Nichijou.  
  
The manga centers on Nagumo, a penniless college student who moves to a town filled with bizarre people.

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/city/)

altTitles.ja: ふたりぼっちのオタサーの姫

altTitles.ja-ro: Futaribocchi no Otaku Circle no Hime

altTitles.ja: Futaribocchi no Otasaa no Hime

altTitles.en: The Otaku Circle's Princess in a Club of Two

description.en: Ooyama Takeko joins an otaku club in the hopes of being worshiped as a princess as she'd be the only female member, but the club she joins only has two members (including herself). Based on a one shot of the same name.
description.ja: 『小林さんちのメイドラゴン』などアニメ化多数の大人気作家が、初の週刊連載でYJに大登場！ 「ヲタクさんたちに”ちやほや”されたい！」 ”姫”を目指して大山武子が入ったオタサーは…、部員が二人しかいなかった！ 1年たっても二人っきりのサークルで、大山は立派な姫になれるのか!? 満たせ欲求！目指せ姫！天然ダメっ娘オタサーコメディ、開幕！

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.en: The Strongest Tamer Returned From Another World With His Childhood Friend as His Familiar

altTitles.id: Penjinak Terkuat Kembali Dari Dunia Lain Dengan Teman Masa Kecilnya sebagai Familiarnya

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
description.ja: 「でも私、ご主人様の渉（わたる）がいないと何もできないよ？」　異世界に突然召喚され、危機を救った高校生の渉と瑠美は、無事に現実世界へと帰還した。しかし、戻ってきたはずの現実世界は様変わりしていて、ダンジョンが発生し、人類はスキルに目覚め、まるで異世界と同じような世界になっていて…　異世界帰りのテイマー・渉と、その使い魔・瑠美。幼馴染以上恋人未満の最強コンビが無双するダンジョンファンタジー

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
The children swear revenge in the midst of war.

The official comic version of the dramatic simulation RPG “Battlefield Fuga” with the theme of “War x Revenge x Beasts” “Battlefield” 'Fuga Melody of Steel'! The manga was written by Takafumi Adachi (representative works: "DM Fighter Homura'' and "Metal Fight Beyblade,'' etc.).

＜Synopsis＞
A world made up of floating islands of various sizes - a floating continent, where two types of races, "inuhito" and "nekohito" live.
Marto, an Inuhito boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei while herding sheep in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, the village is suddenly attacked by the northeastern country ``Berman Empire,'' and it burns to the ground overnight. How could something like this happen... Marto and the others were confused, and a mysterious voice came from the radio...! ?

Children caught up in the war board the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' to retrieve their abducted families!

As an appendix exclusive to the book, it also includes setting drawings by Takafumi Adachi and a development blog by Hiroshi Matsuyama, general director of the game software ``Fuga of Battlefield'' and CEO of Cyber ​​Connect Two Co., Ltd.
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

altTitles.ja: 僕はビートルズ

description.en:
This is the tale of the members of a [Beatles](https://mangadex.org/title/877aa28e-5c75-469c-84b1-4730bd321f53) cover band in Tokyo who find themselves 
transported back in time to 1961 -before anyone had ever heard of the Beatles-   
and decide to take the mantle of the world's greatest rock band for themselves!  
But will they dare to pursue this dream until the end ?
description.pt-br: Essa é a história dos membros de uma banda de cover dos [Beatles](https://mangadex.org/manga/15038) em Tóquio, que são transportados pelo tempo até 1961 - antes de qualquer um conhecer os Beatles - e decidem tomar o manto da maior banda de rock do mundo para eles mesmos! Mas será que eles conseguem perseguir esse sonho até o fim?

title.en: Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai

altTitles.ja: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい

altTitles.en: Hero's Party Want to Experience LOVE

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyō Yūsha Pātī wa Ai ga Shiritai

description.en:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

altTitles.ja: 悪の華道を行きましょう

altTitles.en: Let's Go on the Evil Runway

altTitles.hu: Nem sétálunk le kézen fogva a gonoszság virágos útján?

altTitles.id: Akankah kita berjalan begandengan tangan di jalan kejahatan yang berbunga?
Mari kita berjalan sembari bergandengan turun ke jalan kejahatan yang berbunga-bunga

altTitles.pt-br: Vamos andar de mãos dadas pelo caminho florido para a maldade?

altTitles.es: ¿Caminamos de la mano por el camino florido del mal?

altTitles.th: เส้นทางปีศาจที่งดงามนั่นน่ะ จะไปด้วยกันดีไหม?

description.en: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...
description.ja: 王子に捨てられた美貌の悪役令嬢セレスティーヌ。醜い禿げデブオヤジといやがらせ婚の最中……突然よみがえる前世の記憶…！ そして…あれ!? でもなんかこの人…悪くない。ちょっと素敵かも……？ 悪女として、そして枯れ専として、我が道を行くセレスティーヌの華道をご覧あれ！
description.pt: Celestine, a vilã, de repente se lembra de suas memórias de sua vida passada quando ela está no altar, prestes a se casar com um primeiro-ministro com o dobro de sua idade e cercada pelos mais terríveis rumores como punição por seus crimes contra o príncipe e seu amante. Ela percebe que este é o mundo de um jogo otome que ela jogou naquela vida anterior, mas mais importante do que isso, ela também herda gostos muito específicos da vida passada…

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.en:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

title.en: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 推しの美少女に告白される話

altTitles.en: I was Confessed to by my Beautiful Oshi

description.en: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
description.ja: 推しの美少女に告白されて恋人になるラブコメ百合漫画です。
description.pt-br: Um romcom yuri onde uma estrela se confessa e vira uma namorada.
